name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Douyin Downloader 简单抖音下载器

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple Douyin Downloader 简单抖音下载器

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a free Douyin video downloader which allows you to download videos from https://www.douyin.com/ (The TikTok of Chinese version) without any watermark. Download a video from Douyin is never easier. Just click on the cloud download icon near the video slider or click on the download button in the extension popup to start the download.   免费无水印抖音视频插件, 只需要点击云下载图标或者插件选项上的download按钮即可下载。下载视频如此简单。

Update
version 1.4, resolve the issue related to inability to download video from the 3rd video
版本1.4 更新，解决从第三个开始无法下载的问题
version 1.5,  resolve the issue related to inability to download video from mainland China 
版本1.5 更新，解决无法从中国大陆下载视频的问题
version 1.6,  resolve the issue related to inability to download long video 
版本1.6 更新，解决无法下载长视频的问题
